name: Cowboy Legs
description:
Cowboy Legs has the player controlling Otis Jenkins, a man with incredibly long legs who fell into an infinitely deep canyon in old western Utah. Use the mouse to flick his long legs higher and higher all the while avoiding cacti and the rival cowboys: The Bush Gang Boys.

Try to beat your high score and kick some bushes along the way!

Also check out the devlog and the math behind the making of this game:
